game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is threatened by an ancient evil known as the Time Reavers. Players take on the role of a temporal guardian, tasked with repairing the timestream and defeating the Time Reavers' leader, the mysterious Clockwork King.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic future where time has lost all meaning. The player must navigate through a maze-like world, avoiding temporal anomalies and hostile creatures to reach the first time portal.
game.ending: After traversing through various eras of history, from ancient civilizations to dystopian futures, the player finally confronts the Clockwork King in an epic showdown. With time hanging in the balance, the player must use all their skills and abilities to repair the timestream and restore order to the universe.
